arts.ttl: Nemanja Matic's Post After Andre Onana's Mistakes in Lyon 2-2 Man Utd Goes Viral
arts.sum: Matic, following his war-of-words with Onana, was quick to post after the game.

arts.ttl: Paul Scholes Claims Ruben Amorim Was Lying in Interview After Lyon 2-2 Man Utd
arts.sum: Former Manchester United star Paul Scholes believes Ruben Amorim was lying about liking his team following a 2-2 draw with Lyon.

arts.ttl: Rasmus Hojlund is wilting under the spotlight after a disastrous display in Lyon... so, THIS is what he needs to do to salvage his Man United career
arts.sum: NATHAN SALT: Rasmus Hojlund's display in Lyon, which saw French newspaper L'Equipe rate him as the worst player on the pitch with a 2/10 grade, typified the crossroads he is at in his career.

arts.ttl: Ruben Amorim explains plan for Andre Onana after latest Man Utd nightmare at Lyon
arts.sum: Ruben Amorim watched on as Andre Onana's errors cost Manchester United in their Europa League clash as the manager was left to digest the goalkeeper's latest blunder

arts.ttl: Leny Yoro struggles to hide his frustration with Andre Onana after Lyon display - as he says Man United keeper's late blunder came at 'worst moment'
arts.sum: Onana's disastrous game came after he had been involved in a war of words with former Manchester United - and now Lyon - midfielder Nemanja Matic in the build-up to the clash.

arts.ttl: Friday’s briefing: Andre Onana makes headlines again as Man Utd held by Lyon
arts.sum: Joshua Zirkzee’s late goal had looked enough to give United a crucial away win

arts.ttl: Man United fans accuse French police of tear-gassing them after being kept behind in the stadium following 2-2 draw in Lyon
arts.sum: United will head back to Manchester for the second leg of their European quarter-final clash all square in the tie, having come from behind to initially lead on the other side of the Channel.

arts.ttl: Ruben Amorim heaps praise on £52m Man United star who now 'feels at home' after difficult start at Old Trafford following impressive display in Lyon draw
arts.sum: Manchester United boss Ruben Amorim was particularly impressed with one player after Thursday's 2-2 draw with Lyon in the first leg of their Europa League quarter-final.

arts.ttl: Ruben Amorim insists he's still 'really confident' in Andre Onana despite the Man United goalkeeper's two howlers in 2-2 draw with Lyon
arts.sum: CHRIS WHEELER: Onana was twice at fault as United were held 2-2 in the quarter-finals, conceding an equaliser with the last kick of the game.

arts.ttl: Leny Yoro makes telling admission about Andre Onana howler as Man Utd held to Lyon draw
arts.sum: Andre Onana was at fault twice as Manchester United drew 2-2 away to Lyon in the first leg of their Europa League quarter-final on Thursday, with the goalkeeper coming under fire
